name: Cubic getaway
description:
CUBIC GETAWAY

This is a small game where you have to escape from a procedurally generated dungeon and try to find the stairs to proceed to the next floor. When you have nothing better to do, you can play this game, relax and try to beat your high-score.

Features:

  • Procedually generated - Always different dungeons.
  • Escape! - It's fun...
  • Beat your high-score! - How many dungeon levels can you pass?
  • Good if you have nothing else to do.

In the game there are two modes: Level mode and time mode. In level mode you have to find stairs and get to another level, In time mode you have to run as long as you can. (In time mode there are not high-scores, only in level mode).

(NOTE: The game has changed a little bit and the trailer is not up to date. I'm too lazy to make another trailer. Jokes aside, I'm not lazy, I just have other things to do.)

Thanks for playing!
